lyrics:
2 contributorsforget my name lyricsintro
tell all my friends im dead
im leaving you this time its for good
tell all my friends that im dead
it wont be long before you forget my name

verse 1
can you tell
that im losing myself
i think im trying too hard to
let it show
to let you know
dont trace your footsteps back to me

prechorus
cause ive been gone for a long time
waiting on the sidelines
hoping for a chance to play
well i thought i would never leave anything behind
i also never thought id say

chorus
tell all my friends im dead
im leaving you this time its for good
tell all my friends that im dead
it wont be long before you forget my name
you might also likeverse 2
cant you tell
that i dont know myself
i need someone to remind me
to let it go
please let me know
dont trace your footsteps back to me

prechorus
cause ive been gone for a long time
waiting on the sidelines
hoping for a chance to play
well i thought i would never leave anything behind
i also never thought id say

chorus
tell all my friends im dead
im leaving you this time its for good
tell all my friends that im dead
it wont be long before you forget my name

bridge
and if i had the chance  had the chance
to do it all again
i wouldnt expect anything less
and if i had the chance  had the chance
to do it all again
i wouldnt expect
i wouldnt expect anything less
chorus
tell all my friends im dead
im leaving you this time its for good
tell all my friends that im dead
it wont be long before you forget my name

outro
forget my nameembed
